bronze:SpreadShot.NAME: Spread Shot
bronze:SpreadShot.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Blaster. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

bronze:FullForce.NAME: Full Force
bronze:FullForce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Fire ALL bronze:Blasters.

bronze:CascadeBlast.NAME: Cascade Blast
bronze:CascadeBlast.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Blaster. NL Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Fire !M! bronze:Core.
bronze:CascadeBlast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: bronze:Blaster. NL Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Fire !M! bronze:Cores.

bronze:ShockCore.NAME: Shock Core
bronze:ShockCore.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Core. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain [E].

bronze:MachineFire.NAME: Machine Fire
bronze:MachineFire.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Fire 1 bronze:Blaster. Repeat its effects X times.

bronze:SeerCore.NAME: Seer Core
bronze:SeerCore.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Core. NL Scry !M!. NL Gain [E]. NL Draw 1 card.

bronze:BoomerangBolt.NAME: Boomerang Bolt
bronze:BoomerangBolt.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Blaster. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Reduce this card's cost by 1.

bronze:DeferProcess.NAME: Defer Process
bronze:DeferProcess.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Next turn, gain [E].

bronze:StackOverflow.NAME: Stack Overflow
bronze:StackOverflow.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Fire 1 bronze:Blaster. bronze:Fire 1 card from your discard and draw piles.
bronze:StackOverflow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL bronze:Fire 1 bronze:Blaster. bronze:Fire 1 card from your discard and draw piles.

bronze:HeldProtector.NAME: Held Protector
bronze:HeldProtector.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Shield. NL If Fired: Gain 1 Artifact.
bronze:HeldProtector.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: bronze:Shield. NL Reduce this card's cost by 1. NL If champ:Fired: Gain 1 Artifact.

bronze:Barrage.NAME: Barrage
bronze:Barrage.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, bronze:Fire 1 bronze:Blaster.

bronze:ShiningCore.NAME: Shining Core
bronze:ShiningCore.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Core. NL bronze:Burnout. NL Gain [E]. NL If champ:Fired: Stun the enemy for 1 turn.

bronze:QuadCore.NAME: Quad Core
bronze:QuadCore.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Core. NL bronze:Burnout. NL Gain [E]. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E].
bronze:QuadCore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: bronze:Core. NL Gain [E]. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E].

bronze:Subroutine.NAME: Subroutine
bronze:Subroutine.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next card you bronze:Fire costs 0.

bronze:PrepDefense.NAME: Prep Defense
bronze:PrepDefense.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Shield. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Add 1 *Reserve *Guard into your hand.

bronze:ReserveGuard.NAME: Reserve Guard
bronze:ReserveGuard.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL bronze:Fire 1 bronze:Shield. NL Exhaust.

bronze:Goto.NAME: Goto
bronze:Goto.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Scry !M!. NL bronze:Fire the top card of your draw pile.

bronze:LockOn.NAME: Lock-On
bronze:LockOn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL bronze:Fire 1 bronze:Blaster.
